label: SLATE_BEGIN_ARGS()
detail: Function (# pragma once # include " Framework / SlateDelegates . h " # include " SActionButton . h " # include " Widgets / DeclarativeSyntaxSupport . h " # include " Widgets / SCompoundWidget . h " # include " Widgets / Input / SComboButton . h " class SPositiveActionButton : public SCompoundWidget,public IActionButton { public :)

label: SLATE_ATTRIBUTE()
insertText: SLATE_ATTRIBUTE(FText, Text) SLATE_ATTRIBUTE(const FSlateBrush*, Icon) SLATE_EVENT(FOnClicked, OnClicked) SLATE_NAMED_SLOT(FArguments, MenuContent) SLATE_EVENT(FOnGetContent, OnGetMenuContent) SLATE_EVENT(FOnComboBoxOpened, OnComboBoxOpened) SLATE_EVENT(FOnIsOpenChanged, OnMenuOpenChanged) SLATE_END_ARGS() SPositiveActionButton()
